matches.name: All Is Dust
matches.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices all permanents they control that are one or more colors.
matches.flavor_text:
"The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

matches.name: Eye of Doom
matches.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, each player chooses a nonland permanent and puts a doom counter on it.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy each permanent with a doom counter on it.

matches.name: Eye of Ugin
matches.oracle_text:
Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
matches.flavor_text: An eye closes. A race awakens.

card_faces.name: Far
card_faces.oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card_faces.name: Away
card_faces.oracle_text:
Target player sacrifices a creature of their choice.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

matches.name: Fit of Rage
matches.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.
matches.flavor_text:
"Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal."
—Karn, silver golem

matches.name: Lie in Wait
matches.oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Lie in Wait deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.
matches.flavor_text: Some paths through Gurmag Swamp are deserted for good reason.

matches.name: Out of Time
matches.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, untap all creatures, then those creatures phase out until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. Put a time counter on this enchantment for each creature that phased out this way.
Vanishing (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from this enchantment. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

matches.name: Pay No Heed
matches.oracle_text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
matches.flavor_text: "My course is before me. There is nothing behind me."

matches.name: Ray of Ruin
matches.oracle_text: Exile target creature, Vehicle, or nonbasic land. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
matches.flavor_text:
"We know Chimil's light as a warming, healing presence, but make no mistake: to those who would desecrate her lands, it is a terrible force of scouring fury."
—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan

matches.name: Rod of Ruin
matches.oracle_text: {3}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to any target.
matches.flavor_text: The good news is it's so simple a goblin could use it. The bad news is it's so simple a goblin could use it.

matches.name: Saw in Half
matches.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their power is half that creature's power and their toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.
matches.flavor_text: The audience always loves it, but volunteers are divided.

matches.name: Sea of Sand
matches.oracle_text:
Players reveal each card they draw.
Whenever a player draws a land card, that player gains 3 life.
Whenever a player draws a nonland card, that player loses 3 life.
Whenever chaos ensues, put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

matches.name: Two by Four
matches.oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Put a base power 4 counter on target creature.
• Put a base toughness 4 counter on target creature.

matches.name: Vow of Duty
matches.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
matches.flavor_text:
"I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."
—Kaalia of the Vast

card_faces.name: Wax
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
